content: भूयिष्ठ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अतिशयेन बहु इष्ठन् भ्वादेशे युक् च] {@--1@} Most, most numerous or abundant. {@--2@} Most important, principal, chief. {@--3@} Very great or large, very much, much, many, numerous. {@--4@} Chiefly or for the most part composed of, mostly composed or consisting of, chiefly filled with or characterized by (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); अभिरूपभूयिष्ठा परिषद् <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; शूल्यमांसभूयिष्ठ आहारोऽश्यते <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; राष्ट्रेषु कतमत्सुपुरुषभूयिष्ठं <ls>Dk.</ls>; शिल्पदारिकाभूयिष्ठं परिजतं <ls>M. 5</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 70.</ls> {@--5@} Almost, mostly, nearly all (usually after a past passive participle); अये उदितभूयिष्ठ एष तपनः <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; निर्वाणभूयिष्ठमथास्य वीर्यं <ls>Ku. 3. 52</ls>; <ls>V. 1. 8.</ls> --ष्ठं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} For the most part, mostly; <ls>Ś. 1. 31.</ls> {@--2@} Exceedingly, very much, in the highest degree; भूयिष्ठं भव दक्षिणा परिजने <ls>Śi. 4. 17</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 4</ls>; <ls n="R.">13. 14.</ls>
